A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed watching it but utterly hated it afterwards. After the insane plot twists and cheap trills were over I was left with my childhood murdered before my eyes\, and it gave me nothing substantial to fill that void. The worst part is I want to see it again hoping this time i will love it after i leave the theater. But for now I hope Rian see's my meme of JarJar saying \"yousa thought I ruined Star Wars\".  # VIII Worst Star Wars Ever
